original_text: Your iniquities have turned away these things, and your sins have withholden good things from you.
korean_text: 너희 허물이 이러한 일들을 물리쳤고 너희 죄가 너희로부터 좋은 것을 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: Your iniquities have turned away these things
and your sins have withholden good things from you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 죄가 너희에게서 좋은 것들을 막았느니라
